accessRequest.sensitiveAccessText: After prior verification (actual presence of sensitive FLORE data within the requested area), my project justifies access to the precise location of sensitive flora data (also specify “Plantae“ in the “Taxonomic Groups“ field)

Synthese.BlurredSensitiveObsMessage:
Warning: The results of your query contain data blurred by sensitivity. Their location will be degraded if you have not requested specific access to this data.

In this case, in the downloadable observation file, the location of this sensitive data will be indicated as “approximate“ ({{blurringField}} field) and the species will be classified as “sensitive data“ (sensibilite field).

After verifying the actual presence of FLORE sensitive data within the scope of your project, you can request access to the precise location of the FLORE sensitive data. In this case, please fill out the available access request form (access conditions are detailed here).

Please note, as the regional sensitivity reference system for fauna data is being finalized, access to sensitive FAUNA data is not currently open at a scale smaller than 10km grid.
